title: So ex-Team Immunity win... again.
body: When is Riot OCE going to realize this is going to keep happening until they adopt an LCS-style format and pay the top tier players so that they are able to train as a team in one location and not have to worry about working or studying.

replies.body:
It's not necessarily up to Riot. OCE teams have trouble getting big sponsors to pay for things like houses and food because of various barriers like viewership numbers, time zones & geographical locations to name a few. If Chiefs have a great showing at IWCI & potentially MSI, then we may see a rise in the possibility of sponsors. Until we show we are good, we wont have the funding to train to be good. 

Lets just hope Chiefs have a really good showing.
To be fair, our OCE teams are probably at the same level that the NA and EU teams were at the end of Season 2 and then they got the LCS in the next year.
